title: Ana's meatballs in tomato sauce
ingredients: ['500g mince (pork, beef or both)', '4 to 5 garlic cloves, crushed', '1 egg', 'salt and pepper to taste', '2 slices bread, soaked in some milk', 'plain flour as needed', 'oil as needed', '3 to 4 tablespoons tomato paste', '1 beef stock cube', '1/2 teaspoon caster sugar']
